name: Cyber security champions
description:
"Cyber security сhampions" is an educational and preventive game in the format of a quiz, the purpose of which is to prevent cybercrimes against children.

Game modes:

1. One player. Quiz with four answer options, 60 seconds to answer.

At easy levels, there is an option to skip questions.

2. Hot place.

Local multiplayer for 2-8 players, the first to score 1000 points wins.

3. Blitz.

The game mode has 2 answer options "yes" or "no" and comments after each question.

4. Challenge.

6 random categories "Security", "Trust", "Social", "Privacy", "Gadgets" and "Mix x2". In the "Mix x2" category, questions from all categories are collected and the value of points in it is doubled.
